p: Peak 1 with a pseudo-molecular ion at m/z: 191.05569 was identified as quinic acid (C 7H 11O 6 −) and its isomer peak 2 as isoquinic acid at m/z 191.05557. Peak 3 was identified as citric acid (C 6H 7O 7 −). Peak 4 with a molecular ion at m/z: 47.02917 was identified as 2-hydroxyglutaric acid (C 5H 7O 5 −). peak 12 as rehmaionoside A (C 19H 33O 8 −), a constituent of Rehmannia glutinosa (Gaertn.) DC. ( Liu et al., 2020).
